    The Erlang PDF.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Erlang​(Variable x, int k, BigDecimal lambda)
      Builds the function lambda^k x^(k-1) e^(-lambda x) / (k-1)! over [0, +infty).
      Erlang​(Erlang erlang)
      Builds a copy of the input Erlang.
